title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-4.5 - Validated examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-4.5 - Validated examinations

State Regulations

The department will require any person applying for certification as a water treatment operator, water treatment assistant operator or distribution system operator to take a written, oral and/or practical skills validated examination to determine the applicant's skills, knowledge, ability and judgement. The results of the examination, and the requirements of sections
5-4.3
and/or 5-4.4 of this Subpart, will serve as the basis for approval or disapproval of such application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-4.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
